TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ θ ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n oʊ p iː z f aɪ θ ɪ k s l æ m ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɚ ɹ ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ k t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k ə n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w əl m iː ɾ ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
